field.name: summary
field.value: ColumnType="Some ICompositeUserType derived type' generates invalid mapping

field.name: description
field.value:
If you use a ColumnType that implements ICompositeUserType the following error message NH raises 'property mapping has wrong number of columns'
In case of the classical Money (Amount and Currency) example you would expect a mapping like this: <property name="Price" access="property" type="MoneyType,Model.Assembly"> <column name="Amount"/> or <column name="Price_Amount"/> <column name="Currency"/> or <column name="Price_Currency"/> </property>
currently the following mapping is generated: <property name="Price" access="property" type="MoneyType,Model.Assembly"> <column name="Price"/> </property>
